COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142
STRING: I spent yesterday doing nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e
STRING: And I was starting to imagine that I would spend today
in the same way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180
STRING: [Torta] “What's wrong? You've been a bit strange since
yesterday. Don't you have rehearsals soon?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Oh... Yeah, soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2
STRING: [Torta] “Ohh, right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200
STRING: You're rehearsing with a first year. You have to pass the
time until she gets out of class.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, pretty much...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a
STRING: I lied to Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x246
STRING: I couldn't just tell anyone about what had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252
STRING: Torta seemed satisfied with my response, and she soon
went home as it was a Thursday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x268
STRING: Watching her leave, I thought about what I would do to
pass the time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a
STRING: [Asino] “Hey, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b0
STRING: [Chris] “Asino...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c6
STRING: Asino suddenly spoke to me when I was staring out the
window absent-mindedly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dc
STRING: [Chris] “You're not going to Ms. Cordell's class today?
You've only got ten more minutes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x304
STRING: [Asino] “I'm going to that special lecture today. Didn't I
tell you about it last week?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a
STRING: [Chris] “Lecture? Ahh... Now that you mention it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34c
STRING: [Asino] “You completely forgot about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37a
STRING: Oh well. I'm going to head there now, what about you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x390
STRING: [Chris] “The lecture, huh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b4
STRING: It would probably be a good way to kill time... But I
wasn't really that interested.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ca
STRING: It was at this point that I remembered something which
I had thought was strange.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e0
STRING: I ran into Lise when I was looking at the bulletin board
that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f6
STRING: And for some reason she asked me if I was going to
attend the lecture, and seemed relieved when I said I
wasn't.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x428
STRING: [Asino] “Hey...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x470
STRING: [Asino] “The lecture's in a different Wing, so I'd better
get moving.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x486
STRING: [Chris] “Wait a sec, I'll go with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b8
STRING: [Asino] “Oh? What a surprise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e6
STRING: But, you're totally welcome to come. I'd be a bit uneasy
by myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fc
STRING: [Chris] “Uneasy? You? You're kidding, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52e
STRING: [Asino] “Despite what you may think, I'm a bit sensitive.
Unlike a certain friend of yours.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54e
STRING: [Chris] “I'll tell her you said that. Anyway, let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ce
STRING: Upon entering the lecture room, I found that most of
the seats were already taken, and that the majority of
the Fortelle course students that I knew were here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ee
STRING: And...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60e
STRING: There was someone rather teacher-like at the lectern,
setting up a Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x624
STRING: He cast a glance at us as we entered from the back of
the room, and then returned to his preparations.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x664
STRING: [Asino] “Oh crap, he's already here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x692
STRING: We're already making a bad first impression.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69e
STRING: As over half of the seats were already full, we found
ourselves somewhere to sit toward the back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b4
STRING: [Chris] “I guess we should get our Fortelles ready?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e6
STRING: [Asino] “I think we can just wait until we're given
instructions. No one else is getting ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x706
STRING: There were no instructions or anything like that on the
blackboard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x712
STRING: I guess we just had to sit here and wait patiently, as
Asino said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x728
STRING: [Chris] “It's pretty quiet, huh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x746
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76a
STRING: Perhaps it was because everyone was nervous, but I
could barely find any other people that were talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x780
STRING: Which meant our voices traveled unnecessarily far.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78c
STRING: Fortunately, it seemed that our voices weren't reaching
the teacher, as he never looked up at us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b2
STRING: At exactly the same moment that the bell rang, he
stood in front of the lectern and presented himself in a
dignified manner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e4
STRING: [Grave] “Let us begin the special lecture.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x810
STRING: Just as he spoke, the door opened and a student I
didn't recognize tried to enter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x826
STRING: [Student] “I'm sorry I'm late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x858
STRING: [Asino] “Ugh, he's late again...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86e
STRING: It seemed that Asino knew the student, and chuckled as
he commented.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x884
STRING: The student in question tried to take a seat at the back
of the room, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c4
STRING: [Grave] “Students who are not capable of being on time
are not qualified to take this lecture. Remove yourself
from this room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e4
STRING: [Student] “Huh? But, the bell only just went...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x902
STRING: [Grave] “Do you not know how to address your
superiors? Very well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93a
STRING: When I tell you to get out, you get out posthaste.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x954
STRING: He wasn't angry in the way he spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x960
STRING: But there was not a single student in the room that
didn't feel the disgust or nuance of insult that filled the
words that he spat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x976
STRING: Looking embarrassed, the student just backed out and
left he classroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x982
STRING: Even I could tell that if he had stayed, the teacher
wouldn't have given him a chance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x998
STRING: Nobility, huh...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a4
STRING: Actually, Asino said the teacher was from the highest
tier of nobility.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b0
STRING: By this time, the lecture had already begun to make me
sick.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9bc
STRING: From the way he was unable to display any degree of
flexibility, and from his intolerance, I felt I had just seen
how shallow this person was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d2
STRING: Ms. Cordell was also quite unforgiving of tardiness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9de
STRING: But even then she would still let the student into the
classroom, after scolding them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f4
STRING: And strictly reminding them not to be late again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1c
STRING: [Grave] “Allow me to begin with an introduction. I, am
Grave Cesarini.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3c
STRING: Beautifully articulating his name, it was quite apparent
just how much confidence he had in who he was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5a
STRING: [Grave] “Now, I believe I made it clear how many
applicants would be accepted, but it would appear we
have too many. You should all be more realistic about
your worth to me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa84
STRING: The teacher who referred to himself as Grave, didn't
hesitate at all as he spoke those words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9a
STRING: The room broke out into a small commotion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaae
STRING: [Grave] “Silence. We shall now begin screenings. Those
closest to the front will be first, the rest will follow in
order.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xace
STRING: He spoke as if he barely even noticed the students'
reactions to him, and returned to his seat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae4
STRING: The student sitting closest to the front cautiously
approached him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb02
STRING: [Grave] “Name?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb18
STRING: [Student] “Y-Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb36
STRING: [Grave] “Those who don't know their own names, may
leave. Next!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4c
STRING: [Student] “U-Umm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6a
STRING: [Grave] “Do not make me repeat myself. If the next
student takes too long, they too will be disqualified.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: [Student] “Y-Yes sir!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba4
STRING: And like this, the screenings or whatever they were,
continued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb0
STRING: [Chris] “What is going on here...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe2
STRING: [Asino] “Beats me... Anyway, I'm glad we're last. We can
work out a good approach.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc02
STRING: [Chris] “Why don't we just leave?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc34
STRING: [Asino] “Don't be stupid.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4a
STRING: [Chris] “I just don't like it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7c
STRING: [Asino] “Don't say it, even if you're thinking it. That's the
secret to getting ahead in life.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc92
STRING: [Chris] “I'm only saying it because it's you who's
listening.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb0
STRING: [Asino] “That, and trust no one. This one's important
too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc6
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, okay. But really, I'm not going to make
the cut anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd02
STRING: [Asino] “You never know? Anyway, just grit your teeth
and at least go through the screening.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd18
STRING: [Chris] “Roger that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3c
STRING: It was finally our turn.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd48
STRING: As ridiculous as it seemed, there was only one student
so far that wasn't sent out of the classroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5e
STRING: He was one of the top students, and the best Fortelle
player in our class.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd74
STRING: I was expecting the screening to involve playing the
Fortelle, but he was the only student to be tested in
that way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8a
STRING: There was no one else left, besides him, and the female
student who was being screened at this very moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda0
STRING: Doing the math, I realized that even if Asino and I, and
she were to make the cut, there would still be too
many.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb6
STRING: [Chris] “I'll go first. Hopefully you'll hear something that
will help you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde8
STRING: [Asino] “Hm? Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0c
STRING: I had never seen Asino look as serious as he did just
now as he looked at Grave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe22
STRING: I stood up, and moved closer to the lectern.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2e
STRING: As far as I knew, that female student was a wonderful
Fortelle player, second only to the top student who had
passed the screening.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe44
STRING: Just as I was thinking that she would make the cut, she
was callously cut down by Grave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe76
STRING: [Grave] “You may leave.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8c
STRING: [Schoolgirl] “Huh...? What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeaa
STRING: [Grave] “Next!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec0
STRING: I was already disgusted over the whole thing, and when
I approached the front, the girl who had just been failed
spoke out in protest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee0
STRING: [Schoolgirl] “I don't understand. My recitals have all
been successful, so why...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf00
STRING: The voice in my head was telling her not to hold back,
but unsurprisingly Grave responded in a calm and
collected tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf32
STRING: [Grave] “Recitals? I am not here to talk about such
child's play. I am speaking of things to come.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf52
STRING: He didn't seem to care about our achievements thus far.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5e
STRING: But, if that was the case...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6a
STRING: [Schoolgirl] “Then, how can you make such a judgment
without even hearing me play?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf92
STRING: [Grave] “Your fingers.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa8
STRING: [Schoolgirl] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc6
STRING: [Grave] “I can tell by looking at your fingernails. They
are most beautiful.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfdc
STRING: [Schoolgirl] “What about them?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffa
STRING: [Grave] “You have made an effort to make them
beautiful for someone to see, have you not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101a
STRING: [Schoolgirl] “Th-That's got nothing to do with this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1038
STRING: [Grave] “They are not the fingers of a Fortelle player.
Long fingernails only obstruct the playing of the keys.
From that alone I can tell how much skill you have, even
without hearing you play.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1062
STRING: [Schoolgirl] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1080
STRING: [Grave] “Next!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a4
STRING: This time she said nothing, and simply left the
classroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ba
STRING: What he had said was correct.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c6
STRING: I practice a lot, albeit not everyday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d2
STRING: And because of that, there was a time when I felt that
my fingernails grew slowly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e8
STRING: That was when I was a child; now it felt as if they were
growing normally, however.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fe
STRING: [Chris] “Chris Vertin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1114
STRING: I stated my name, and took a step forward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113c
STRING: [Grave] “One of Cordell's students, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1166
STRING: Saying only that, he then for some reason looked me in
the eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: He had the kind of eyes that seemed as if they could
see through anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117e
STRING: I wouldn't say they made me feel fear... But they
definitely commanded a sense of awe.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118a
STRING: It wasn't because he was a member of the nobility, or
anything like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1196
STRING: I suppose it was a testament to his pedigree, coming
from a revered family of musicians.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a2
STRING: But even if that was the case, I don't think I would ever
find myself respecting him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b8
STRING: I understood that he was right about what he said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c4
STRING: But even so, I wasn't impressed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d8
STRING: [Grave] “Play your best song.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ee
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120c
STRING: [Grave] “Did you not hear me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1222
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, no, I did...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1246
STRING: Doing as I was told, I sat myself at the Fortelle he had
set up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125c
STRING: [Chris] “This is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: There is a school of thought that the best instrument is
the one that you're used to, but this Fortelle felt so
incredible that I could easily have believed otherwise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1288
STRING: The smooth keyboard was polished like porcelain, and
everything felt as if it was conveniently placed there just
for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a8
STRING: It was sophisticated in every aspect.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d0
STRING: [Grave] “Is there a problem?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e6
STRING: [Chris] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130a
STRING: I barely gave a proper answer, and for a split second
was unsure of what song to play.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1320
STRING: My best song... Would have been the one that I always
rehearsed with Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1336
STRING: Lise's song came to mind briefly, but that was a song
which focused on the vocals.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134c
STRING: It wouldn't have been the right choice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1358
STRING: In the beginning I had come in expecting not to make
the cut, but now I felt like doing something that he
would have to admit worthy of recognition.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136e
STRING: I was fully aware that it came from a small desire to
fight back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x137a
STRING: But even so, I had no choice now but to play something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1386
STRING: I placed my fingers on the keys, and played with
determination.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c4
STRING: Finished, I removed my fingers from the keyboard, and
caught my breath.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d0
STRING: If I were to do a self evaluation, I would have to say that
I played well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e6
STRING: Grave looked at me as if he was examining me, and
then spoke in a small voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1418
STRING: [Grave] “You may stay. Next!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143c
STRING: He was no longer paying any attention to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1448
STRING: I considered just walking out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1454
STRING: But... Asino was already standing right behind me, and
he whispered something in my ear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1486
STRING: [Asino] “Nice work.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b4
STRING: But, there's still some seats left. You just wait!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ca
STRING: [Chris] “Alright...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ee
STRING: For the time being, I sat myself down in one of the
empty seats near the front and waited, hoping that
Asino would return.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1504
STRING: It probably wouldn't have been fair on the student
sitting next to me, but I had planned to leave if Asino
didn't come back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1536
STRING: [Grave] “Now, play the song that you think is your best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154c
STRING: I suppose it was safe to say he passed the first trial.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1558
STRING: Relieved at that, Asino started playing, but Grave
stopped him before he even finished the first bar.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b4
STRING: [Grave] “Enough. I gave you a chance to play, as you
are a student of Cordell's, however...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d4
STRING: He said no more than this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e0
STRING: However, from his tone and his attitude, these words
were more than enough.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1612
STRING: [Asino] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162a
STRING: Asino did not protest, and simply responded calmly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1636
STRING: He turned his gaze to me for just a moment, and then
left the classroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1668
STRING: [Grave] “Well then. More of you remained this year than
I had expected.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x167e
STRING: I was unable to not think about what those words had
meant, and missed my opportunity to stand up and
leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1694
STRING: Did that mean that every year there was only about one
person who passed?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a8
STRING: [Grave] “Today I am going to teach you about the
essence of the Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1714
STRING: Even after Grave had left the classroom, I was still just
sitting there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1720
STRING: The other student had already left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172c
STRING: What Grave had taught us today, was something like
the life story of the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1744
STRING: He taught us of small details not found in the history
books, the words rolling effortlessly from his tongue as
if he knew every detail off by heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1766
STRING: The entire time, I had my eye out for an opportunity to
leave...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x177c
STRING: However, I found myself incapable of doing so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1788
STRING: As much as I hated to admit it, his knowledge was
incredible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1794
STRING: Actually, not only did he have knowledge, but he was
also blessed with a gift for rhetoric.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a0
STRING: I was drawn into his words, and before I knew it I had
stayed until the very end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b6
STRING: The only thing that bothered me, was when he
repeatedly preached that Fortelle players were meant
to be proud.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17cc
STRING: I seriously thought about leaving when he spoke at
great length about just how much Fortelle players had
contributed to the culture of the country.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e2
STRING: But even then, I couldn't leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f8
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1816
STRING: In any case... It was safe to say that I had gained
something today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182c
STRING: I still didn't understand the true meaning of what Lise
had said to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1838
STRING: Grave told us that we would have a practical lesson
next week, but I wondered just how much I could learn
from him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1850
STRING: Even if I was unable to respect him as a human being, I
did understand that he was a top class musician, and
had the skills to prove it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1870
STRING: Truly unsure of what to do next week, I left the
classroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ae
STRING: By the time I realized, it seemed that quite some time
had passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ba
STRING: Asino didn't put it into words, but he must have been
angry on the inside at what Grave had said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d0
STRING: He had already gone home by the time I got outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18dc
STRING: For the time being, I decided to forget about all of this
and just focus on what I would do when I met Lise the
day after tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192a
STRING: I ate a light dinner, and placed my fingers on my
Fortelle without any real purpose.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1936
STRING: What had Grave felt from my performance that made
him decide to choose me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x194c
STRING: I doubted that Ms. Cordell would have put in a good
word for me, but it seemed that he was interested in
the fact that I was her student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1962
STRING: Although, I wondered what would happen if he found
out that I hadn't even chosen a partner for the recital
yet...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ae
STRING: [Phorni] “For a moment, I thought you were practicing
hard for a change. You look so serious!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ce
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean, ‘for a change?’ Wait...that's
it!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e4
STRING: I suddenly had an idea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f0
STRING: What would Phorni think of Grave's music? More
precisely, how would it make her feel?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a06
STRING: In today's lecture, I was unable to find out how good he
actually was, but I imagined that I would have the
chance in the near future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1c
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a32
STRING: I didn't say it out loud, but I thought about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a3e
STRING: But, it was rather pointless to do so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4a
STRING: His name would still be that of a revered family, whether
he had ability or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a60
STRING: And would there even be anyone who would believe
the words of a “musical fairy” that they couldn't even
see?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a92
STRING: [Phorni] “Didn't you have something you wanted to talk
about? You just said ‘That's it!’ after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ab2
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... I was just talking to myself, don't worry
about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae4
STRING: [Phorni] “Grr! Now I wanna know!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1afa
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I can't really do anything about that...
Alright, can I ask you a question?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b36
STRING: [Phorni] “I really feel like you're just avoiding the
subject, but... Okay, go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b56
STRING: [Chris] “As a musical fairy, what is your opinion of the
way I play the Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b92
STRING: [Phorni] “You want an objective opinion, not my
personal one, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, it has to do with what happened today...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd6
STRING: I told Phorni about the events that occurred today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be2
STRING: It wasn't exactly a complicated story, but Phorni started
to think about it, and then disappeared off somewhere.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bf8
STRING: It shouldn't have been such a hard question to answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c04
STRING: Perhaps it was because the events that occurred today
were not the kind that I could ask just anyone about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c1a
STRING: I didn't really care how I was evaluated by others, but
the question still remained.
